title: How can someone have time to ask 34,000 questions while answering so few? - Quora

response.answer_text: You've never had children, have you? It's likely they're part of the Partner Program where they get paid for questions. Many members decided to go for quantity over quality. Some even seem to have bots generating questions for them. Either that or they have a young child and they're simply transcribing. I swear, if kids that young could type they'd make a fortune from the Partner Program.
